description: JSON Schema that the generated specs/tr.json file needs to follow.

url.title: URL of the specification
url.description: URL of the latest version of the specification. URL may contain a fragment to point to a specific section in a specification.

edDraft.title: Editor's Draft URL
edDraft.description: URL of the Editor’s Draft of the specification.

repository.title: URL of the repository
repository.description: URL of the repository that contains the Editor’s Draft of the specification.

feature.title: Feature name
feature.description: In case the reference to the specification would benefit from being more specific than the specification as a whole, the feature property allows to add the name of the specific feature

status.title: Maturity status
status.description: The maturity level of the specification

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: The organization that published the specification.

evergreen.description: The spec may be a draft but is continuously updated and suitable for use as reference.

informative.description: The spec contains only informative content or is/will be published as a Note.

seeAlso.title: See also
seeAlso.description: Other resources worth looking at in relation to this spec

milestones.title: Milestones to reach Recommendation
milestones.description: Describes the current milestones (YYYY-MM-DD) as envisioned by the Working Group

features.title: Features in the specification
features.description: In case the reference to the specification would benefit from being more specific than the specification as a whole, the feature property allows to add the name of the specific feature
